content.text: My fathers brothers: (1) PHIL - Died of a HEART ATTACK (2) MAX - was a PLUMBER also DIED OF HEART ATTACK (3) MEYER - was a [redacted] He died [redacted] Jeffrey only (1974) NAIL. My father had 1 sister, her name was Minnie RABINOWITZ. I attended PS 161. After I graduated - I went to Hebrew School or CROWN ST Hebrew. My Teachers Name was Mr. Brodken. I was Bar Mitzvahed AT THE AFTER NOON My Teachers Name was Mr. ZWILLING. AFTER GRADUATING Hebrew School I went to ALEXANDER HAMILTON HIGH SCHOOL where I stayed for 3½ years. NEVER GRADUATED - I quit School because I NEVER - I Need School. AFTER I quit School I worked for my FATHER ON WALTON ST - BELOW. I worked for him for about 3 years. EARNING FROM - AFTER WORKING FOR HIM - I joined THE CCC CAMPS. They sent me to Brea, California also stayed FROM - 1939-1940. Then I came HOME to CROWN ST- CAN'T FIND A JOB until I was DRAFTED IN THE U.S. ARMY

text_sections.full_transcription: My fathers brothers: (1) PHIL - Died of a HEART ATTACK (2) MAX - was a PLUMBER also DIED OF HEART ATTACK (3) MEYER - was a [redacted] He died [redacted] Jeffrey only (1974) NAIL. My father had 1 sister, her name was Minnie RABINOWITZ. I attended PS 161. After I graduated - I went to Hebrew School or CROWN ST Hebrew. My Teachers Name was Mr. Brodken. relationships: Phil - father's brother (died of heart attack)
Max - father's brother (plumber, died of heart attack)
insights: This appears to be from Mark (listed in TOC as family contributor)
Two redactions about Meyer - sensitive information hidden
Mentions 'Jeffrey only (1974)' suggesting connection to Jeffrey
Didn't graduate high school - quit after 3½ years
Worked for father on Walton St
Joined CCC (Civilian Conservation Corps) during Depression
Shows working-class Jewish immigrant family story
